custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the game is in a live state AND a no hitter/perfect game occurs
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the tile will show an alert

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the game is in a final state AND a no hitter/perfect game occurs
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the tile will show an alert

title: Special State Tags- Featured Game
custom_preconds: GIVEN the featured game is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the game is in a live state AND a no hitter/perfect game occurs
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the tile will show an alert

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the game is in a final state AND a no hitter/perfect game occurs
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the tile will show an alert

title: Special State Tags- Hide Spoilers
custom_preconds: GIVEN an MLB user is in MLB.TV App
custom_steps:
WHEN hide spoilers is on
AND the game is in a live or final state 
AND a no hitter/perfect game occurs
AND the user is viewing a game tile
custom_expected: THEN the user cannot see the special state tag on the game tile

title: Game Tiles- Lock Icons
custom_preconds: GIVEN a MLB.tv un-entitled user (test logged out/logged in free user/ and single team users)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I see games to which I am NOT entitled
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a lock icon will be displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I select game tile that has a lock icon
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a feed picker with messaging to Get MLB.TV or Log in

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I select Login from the feedselect
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I should be dropped on the login page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I select Get MLB.TV from the feedselect
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I should be dropped on the welcome page (Create Account/Browse Subscriptions/Explore Free Content options available)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN an Appletv+ game is available in the game tiles
AND the game is in a pregame state
(Games should be available in the future on Friday nights)

NOTE: If the scenario is not available in production, proxy	https://mastapi.mobile.mlbinfra.com:443/api/epg/v2/search* with mastapi_appletv_pregame_game_in_tiles.json file available at this link (too large to attach): https://drive.google.com/file/d/1pmGtMt37zp5rS1l1S0TxN7rl26k-R5aY/view?usp=sharing
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the game tile should display the "Watch on Apple(Apple is an icon)tv+" badge

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN an Appletv+ game is available in the game tiles
AND the game is in a live state

NOTE: If the scenario is not available in production, proxy	https://mastapi.mobile.mlbinfra.com:443/api/epg/v2/search* with mastapi_appletv_live_game_in_tiles.json file available at this link (too large to attach): 
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1fbv72ec2-4u95d9rp-9IK1qGjDzF-THz/view?usp=sharing
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the game tile should display the "Watch on Apple(Apple is an icon)tv+" badge
AND a live badge should be present

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN an Appletv+ game is available in the game tiles
AND the game is in an archived state
(Games should be available in the past on Friday nights, ex: Tampa vs. Chicago on April 15, 2022)

NOTE: If the scenario is not available in production, proxy	https://mastapi.mobile.mlbinfra.com:443/api/epg/v2/search* with mastapi_appletv_archive_game_in_tiles.json file available at this link (too large to attach):
https://drive.google.com/file/d/139ICHJk8PwpD7uaVl7oSEHjiDzMUnc5C/view?usp=sharing
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the game tile should no longer display the "Watch on Apple(Apple is an icon)tv+" badge

title: Spring Training displays
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user

NOTE: To create the conditions required for this test, proxy https://mastapi.mobile.mlbinfra.com:443/api/epg/v2/search* with the attached mastapi_splitsquad_game_in_tiles.json

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user sees a game with no broadcasts available
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN "No Broadcast Available" messaging appears in the bottom of the game tile

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user sees a game with a Split Squad involved
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a split squad badge(s) appears in the top of the game tile in the side of the team(s) which has a split squad involved

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user sees a game with a Split Squad involved
AND there is a lock icon on the game
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN no Split Squad badge should appear on the game tile

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user sees a game with a Split Squad involved
AND game state messaging appears on the game tile
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN no Split Squad badge should appear on the game tile

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN a non standard team such as a college or foreign league team is involved in the game
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the logo in the game tile will be the fallback generic baseball image

title: Double Header
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user

NOTE: Provided proxy files correspond to games in qa environment, but should work for game tile display purposes

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a double header is in the game tiles
AND the second game time is TBD

NOTE: To replicated the conditions for this test, proxy https://mastapi.mobile.mlbinfra.com:443/api/epg/v2/search* with the attached doubleHeaderQaTbd.json
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN "GAME 2 TBD" displays in the second game tile

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a double header is in the game tiles
AND the second game time is no longer TBD and has been set

NOTE: To replicated the conditions for this test, proxy https://mastapi.mobile.mlbinfra.com:443/api/epg/v2/search* with the attached doubleHeaderQa.json
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the game time displays in the second game tile

title: Stream on: Partner (Proxy Required)
custom_preconds: GIVEN a partner game is present (proxy will be required in order to meet all the conditions available below)
custom_expected:
GIVEN availablePartners AND Broadcast Parters 
WHEN showing game tile THEN only show Available Partners

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a game is not blacked out
AND availablePartners are available
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN show broadcast partners

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a game is blacked out
AND availablePartners are available
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN show STREAM ON: <Available Partners> 
AND the blackout pill does not display

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a game is blacked out
AND availablePartners are available
AND Broadcast Parters are available
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN only show Available Partners
AND the blackout pill does not display

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN availablePartners OR Broadcast Partners are present
AND multiple partners exist
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN use a comma separated string

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN availablePartners OR Broadcast Partners are present
AND line length exceeds a single line
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN truncate with an ellipsis
